summary: aMidianBorn high-resolution texture replacer complete package
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/24909-1-1393052179.png[/img][/center]
[b][color=red]Distribution permission[/color][/b]: This file is a Nexus-exclusive release, please respect my decision and DO NOT reupload it elsewhere. I will not give, nor want to give, permission for any kind of reupload.

PATCHES 
 dual sheath reduX  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64647/?  by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6247421]dptheslothking[/url]

Credits:
Claviceps purpurea ,Ipomea violacea. Grunge music, jodorowsky movies, la calma che precede la tempesta, You.

Answers to frequently asked questions:
Yes, I'm working on weapons too. They will be added here and not as standlone mods.
Yes, I'm doing all vanilla armors. Nonfaction sets first, then faction sets.
Work progression can be seen on the image on the bottom of this page.
NO, I will not make fancy variations and "ad personam" textures. If you do not like my textures, feel free to just not download them.
Yes, this works with any body mod for either gender.
NO, I DO NOT TAKE SCREESHOTS FOR MY MODS, SO I DO NOT KNOW ANYTHING ABOUT ENB USED, CHARACTER CREATION, MAKE UP, AESTHETIC SURGERY, WEATHER, THE SKY, GRASS, ANIMALS, BOOB SIZE OR ANYTHING ELSE. Ask the contributors, please.
